#  Client uuid
sm.client.id: 9937EEAA-C88E-4817-9218-2B8947D5B0E2

#  When the property example_drm.allow_decrypt_content is set to true, 
#  and the client is authentified, the client is authorized to decrypt contents.
#  Else opening decryption session failed.
example_drm.allow_decrypt_content: true
